title: Metamorphosis
description: Change is not always a good thing...Some survived the battle – but not without a price. As one heart starts up again, another dies down. The pure vampires learn their immortality isn't as strong as they'd thought – the status of their hearts determines their vulnerability. And when the truth gets out, a betrayal by one of their own will cost more lives.New Adult Urban FantasyOfficial Book Page: http://devonashleyauthor.com/books/th...
author: Devon Ashley
